lookup.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.sip == 'undefined' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var sip = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.sip)); sip.authorizing_id = doc._id; if(typeof(sip.realm) == 'string') { emit([sip.realm, sip.username], sip); } else { for (var i in sip.realm) emit([sip.realm[i], sip.username], sip); } }

lookup_by_ip.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.sip.ip == 'undefined' || doc.pvt_deleted) return;  emit(doc.sip.ip, {'owner_id':doc.owner_id,  'account_id':doc.pvt_account_id, 'authorizing_type':doc.pvt_type}); }

lookup_by_account.map: function(doc) { if (!doc.pvt_account_id || doc.pvt_deleted) return;  emit(doc.pvt_account_id, null); }
